project.name: ST-01 Observer
project.descriptor: Experimental AI ATC observation platform with real-time visualization, automated reasoning, and minimal engineering UI.
principles: SVG-first, no gradients, no drop shadows
Dark neutral base, cyan as functional accent
Readable at 12–14px, WCAG AA or better

brand.logo_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200' role='img' aria-label='ST-01 Observer logo'><g fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='8'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='70'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='45'/></g><circle cx='140' cy='80' r='6' fill='currentColor'/></svg>

typography.ui_primary: Inter Tight, ui-sans-serif, system-ui, Segoe UI, Roboto, Helvetica, Arial
typography.data_mono: JetBrains Mono, ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Consolas, monospace

iconography.style: Monoline, 1.5–2px stroke at 24px grid, rounded caps, no fills except state dots.

layout.surface: Graphite background, Carbon panels with 1px Neutral Gray borders, 8–12px radius

motion.easing: linear for sweep, ease-out for pulses

accessibility.focus: 2px outline in Radar Cyan, 3px offset shadow in Carbon
accessibility.states: Disabled at 60% opacity; alerts use desaturated red #FF4D4D on Carbon

dashboard.goal: Live ATC scenario and training state verification

panels.content: Aircraft tracks, separation rings, conflict highlights, sector grid.
panels.style: No textures. Cyan for active tracks; Neutral Gray for grid; warning in #FF4D4D.

panels.rules: Monochrome lines, cyan highlight on hover, gridlines at 10% opacity.

panels.content: Rolling 100 decisions with timestamps, observation hash, action, confidence.
panels.format: Monospace table, 12–13px, zebra rows at 4% white tint.

terminal.goal: Developer console for event stream and diagnostics

rules: H1-H3 use Inter Tight, body uses Inter
Callouts: Info (cyan left border), Warning (red left border)

hero.headline: ST-01 Observer
hero.sub: Experimental AI ATC observation and reasoning environment

landing.visual: Centered Synthetic Eye mark with slow sweep; no stock imagery.

motion_clip.description: Dark control surface with concentric rings. A cyan sweep rotates once every 3 seconds. A single blip pulses softly as aircraft state updates appear as minimal cyan ticks on the ring.
motion_clip.lighting: Flat; no specular; pure UI render.

performance: Avoid re-render thrash; batch WebSocket updates
Prefer CSS transforms over top/left for motion

sora_prompt.text: Top-down minimal UI scene of concentric radar rings on a graphite background. A cyan radar sweep rotates once every 3 seconds. A single cyan blip pulses gently every 240ms when it crosses the sweep. No gradients, no 3D lighting, no textures. Orthographic camera, fixed. Monochrome lines with cyan accent. Loop seamlessly in 10 seconds.
